argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Object is an array. .F. = Object is not an array.

page.description: Returns .t. if an object is an array
page.discussion: The ISARRAY() function determines whether an object is an array.
page.example: dim ptr as P ? IsArray(ptr) = .f. dim ptr2[1] as P ? IsArray(ptr2) =.t. ? arraytype(ptr2) = "P"
